title: Protecting The American People Against Invasion – The White House
eli5: The President made new rules about people who come into America without permission. The rules say that police and government workers should work harder to find these people and make them follow the law or leave the country. They also want to build more places to keep people who break these rules until they can be sent back to their home countries.
